page.title: 13Children's Likes in Lostock
page.content:
I enjoy lots of things like animals, videos, books, records or toys. I like most{animals}but my favourites are cats, dogs, horses and all kinds of birds. I have favourite breeds of animals like cats-{Siamese. Dogs-{English Springer Spaniel. Horses-{Arab.}Birds-{Golden Eagle.
I like watching{videos}as well. I like the ones which are funny and scarey{"Thriller"}is good because it is{scarey and is full of excitement.}I also like the ones which are{funny like{"Kenny Everett"}and things like that. I like it when they put{comedy {shows}on video because you can always see the series you have missed. I like{books}as well because they have lots of adventure in them and they are exciting.
